nodes.bodyText:
@Kadrian this rootes the POST to the host:port, where the frontend is hosted.
In development this might not be the same as the backend.
Is it now /api/auth ? We want that everything under api is protected
Arr, true. I'll adjust it again
Should work now. Can you check again?
Thanks, this works. However the loaded datasets are not displayed after successful login.
Good hint, should be fixed now as well!
